sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import { Power3, gsap, Power4 } from 'gsap' import { ScrollTrigger } from 'gsap/dist/ScrollTrigger' import styles from './HeroSection.module.scss' gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger) const Hero = () => { let app = useRef(null) let images = useRef(null) let content = useRef(null) let tl = gsap.timeline({ delay: 0.01 }) useEffect(() => { //Images Vars const firstImg = images.firstElementChild const secondImg = images.lastElementChild //Content Vars const headlineFirst = content.children[0].children[0].children const headlineSecond = content.children[0].children[1].children const headlineThrid = content.children[0].children[2].children const contentP = content.children[1] const contentButton = content.children[2] console.log(headlineFirst) gsap.to(app, 0, { css: { visibility: 'visible' }, ease: Power3.easeOut, }) //Images Animations gsap.from(firstImg.children, { y: -1200, opacity: 0, scale: 1.5, ease: Power4.easeOut, delay: 0.5, duration: 0.5, }) gsap.from(secondImg.children, { y: 1200, opacity: 0, scale: 1.5, ease: Power4.easeOut, delay: 0.5, duration: 0.5, }) //Content Animations gsap.from([headlineSecond, headlineThrid], { stagger: { each: 0.12 }, y: 500, ease: 'Power4.easeOut', skewY: 30, delay: 0.3, duration: 0.8, }) gsap.from(headlineFirst, { y: 170, ease: 'Power4.easeOut', skewY: 20, duration: 0.8, delay: 0.5, }) gsap.from( contentP, 1, { y: 20, opacity: 0, ease: 'back', }, 1.2 ) gsap.from( contentButton, 1, { y: 20, opacity: 0, ease: 'back', }, 1.6 ) }, []) useEffect(() => { gsap.from(content, { scrollTrigger: { trigger: content, toggleActions: 'restart play reverse', start: 'top 500px', //end: 'bottom 100px', pin: true, markers: true, }, }) }) return (
(app = el)}>
(content = el)} >

Messie NUNGI-PAMBU

FRONTEND

DEVELOPER

(images = el)}>

Hi! I'm Messie, a{' '} Frontend Developer based in France.
Sensitive to design, i stress the smaller details to deliver pixel-perfect products.

I know how precious time is, especially in business, and how challenging it can be to retain the user attention, so i adapt quickly and listen carefully to your needs and i constantly try to always offer that little more than what make the difference.

#ReactJS #GatsbyJS #NextJS #Styled-Components
#JavaScript #Redux #Scss

) } export default Hero
